events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred on the morning of March 31st, providing initial details about the accident and damages.
The claim was categorized under 'Auto Accident' after reviewing the description and confirming keywords such as vehicle and collision.
An agent with expertise in auto claims was assigned to the case to ensure prompt and thorough handling of the customer's situation.
Acknowledgement sent to the customer confirming receipt of the claim and outlining the next steps in the investigation process.
Request sent to the customer for additional documentation, including police report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and driver's license copy.
Customer successfully uploaded all requested documents through the online portal, providing clear photos and the official police report.
Investigation team began reviewing the submitted evidence and contacting involved parties to corroborate the circumstances of the accident.
Investigation concluded, confirming liability details and assessing the extent of the vehicle damage with the help of a certified inspector.
A settlement offer was prepared and communicated to the customer, including estimated repair costs and compensation fees.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed appreciation for the clear communication and support.
The claim was formally approved by the underwriter following customer agreement and satisfactory fulfillment of all requirements.
Payment was issued directly to the repair shop and customer’s account to cover the damages as per the agreed settlement.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation that all payments were received and the customer’s vehicle repairs were completed.
The entire case file has been archived for future reference as per company policy and regulatory compliance standards.
